meanings.definition: A substance used to sweeten food or drink.
meanings.sent1: I added some sweeteners to my tea to make it taste better.
meanings.sent2: Many people prefer using natural sweeteners like honey or maple syrup.
meanings.sent3: The sweeteners in the lemonade made it taste like a sugary treat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a sweeteners, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sweeteners in the cake made it irresistible to everyone at the party.

meanings.definition: Someone or something that makes a situation more pleasant or agreeable.
meanings.sent1: Having her around was like having a sweeteners in the group.
meanings.sent2: The music playing in the background acted as a sweeteners to the atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: His jokes were the sweeteners that kept everyone entertained during the long meeting.
meanings.sent4: The colorful decorations were the sweeteners that made the party unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: Her presence was the sweeteners that turned a dull day into a joyful one.
